title: Every game bugsplats when loading in the new client. Even custom games.
body: Every time I try to load into a game it crashes and send me back to the reconnect function in the client, even when I try with a solo custom game. I've tried a full repair on the client, but it didn't seem to work. This started happening in the last two days. Haven't had any games load in so far(I haven't tried real games beyond the first two again because I don't want to get banned.)

replies.body: Did you make any recent changes to your computer like a new video card or a new Monitor?
